title: Noddy's Toyland adventures
brief_description: Four adventures from Noddy and his friends in Toyland. 1.”Noddy loses sixpence” - Everyone’s losing things in Toyland today - the milkman’s watch, Dinah Doll’s new bag and the pink cat’s tail. 2.”Noddy and the goblins” - The goblins have tricked poor Noddy out of his car and hat. 3.”Noddy and the naughty tail” - Look out! Bert Monkey sold his pencil box, forgetting his magic rubber that rubs out everything it touches. 4.”Noddy and the pouring rain” - It’s raining in Toyland, and Noddy’s passengers are getting wet - until Big Ears has a good idea. Based on the stories by Enid Blyton.
